titleStmt.title: Allen Witt to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG0995

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Apprehension of Fugitives from Justice Papers, 1863-1867

body.p:
Irvine Ky 31st Oct 1865
To T. E. Bramlett Govenor of Kentucky
Sir

John & Robert C Wiseman did on yesterday the 30.th day, of October 1865 Shoot and Kill Clayton Witt in the County of Estill and are now running at large John Wiseman is about 350. years of age a small low heavy set a little Stoop shouldered has a scar on his breast from a shot while in the U S. army dark hair., Robert C Wiseman is about 28 years old about 5. feet 10 Inches high light bule eyes and has a large scar on him from a burn as large as a small plate, now Governor will you be so good as to over a reward for them,
